body.raw:
{
    "query": "query GetDetailedScorecard($matchId: String!) {
        liveScorecard(match_id: $matchId) {
            match_id
            match_number
            series_name
            team_a
            team_b
            total_overs
            toss_winner
            toss_type
            current_innings
            match_status
            current_score {
                runs
                wickets
                overs
                balls
                run_rate
            }
            current_over {
                over_number
                total_runs
                total_balls
                total_wickets
                status
                balls {
                    ball_number
                    ball_type
                    run_type
                    runs
                    byes
                    is_wicket
                    wicket_type
                }
            }
            innings {
                innings_number
                batting_team
                total_runs
                total_wickets
                total_overs
                total_balls
                status
                extras {
                    byes
                    leg_byes
                    wides
                    no_balls
                    total
                }
                overs {
                    over_number
                    total_runs
                    total_balls
                    total_wickets
                    status
                    balls {
                        ball_number
                        ball_type
                        run_type
                        runs
                        byes
                        is_wicket
                        wicket_type
                    }
                }
            }
        }
    }",
    "variables": {
        "matchId": "{{match_id}}"
    }
}
